CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Account_Tier__c)=""|| TEXT(Account_Tier__c)="In Progress" || TEXT(Account_Tier__c)="Non Active" ,"", CASE( Order_Frequency_Performance__c , 0, IMAGE("/resource/red_Emoji", "red",20,20), 1, IMAGE("/resource/green_Emoji", "green",20,20), ""))
CustomField.label: Order Frequency Performance
